app.subtitle: Babban kayan aiki ga masu ƙirƙirar harshe
app.title: Korelang

common.confirm: Shin kun tabbata kuna son share wannan abun?

console.ai_failed_no_key: Umurnin AI ya gaza: Ba a saita mabuɗin API ba.
console.configure_key_msg: Saita mabuɗin API ɗinku a cikin menu na Preferences (alamar saiti) don kunna ayyukan AI.
console.configure_key_step: Je zuwa Preferences (Settings) > General sannan ku shigar da mabuɗin Gemini API ɗinku.
console.help_fix: Yana gyara kalmomin da suka keta dokokin aikin.
console.no_violations: Lexicon yana bin dokokin phonotactic na yanzu.
console.processing_error: An samu kuskure yayin sarrafa umarnin AI.
console.proposals_review: An samar da shawarwari. Duba teburin da ke cikin staging area:
console.refactor_complete: An kammala refactoring kuma an haɗa shi.
console.unknown_command: KoreLang Core bai gane umarnin ba.

constraints.script_config_missing: Ba a loda tsarin script ba.

dashboard.default_author: Marubucin da ba a sani ba
dashboard.default_project: Aikin da ba shi da suna
dashboard.define_grammar_desc: Ƙirƙiri dokokin syntax da ke jagorantar harshenku.
dashboard.manage_lexicon_desc: Ƙara, gyara da tsara kalmomi a cikin ƙamus ɗinku.
dashboard.no_data: Babu bayanai da ake da su.

defaults.author: Marubuci
defaults.grammar: Dokoki\n\n// Shigar da dokokin nahawun ku a nan...

genevolve.commit_alert: An aiwatar da canje-canje ga lexicon!
genevolve.desc: Aiwatar da canje-canjen sauti ga lexicon ɗinku kuma ku ga yadda kalmominku ke haɓaka.
genevolve.description: Aiwatar da canje-canjen sauti ga lexicon ɗinku kuma ku duba sakamakon.
genevolve.placeholder: Gudanar da canje-canjen sauti don ganin haɓaka a nan.
genevolve.title: Samarwa & Haɓakawa

genword.constraints_ph: Shigar da takaitawa (misali tsarin CV, fonemes da aka yarda da su)
genword.desc: Samar da kalmomi dangane da abin da kuka shigar.
genword.placeholder: Har yanzu ba a samar da kalmomi ba.
genword.title: Samar da kalmomi
genword.vibe_ph: Shigar da yanayin ma'anar da ake so (misali 'na da', 'na zamani')

grammar.bnf_placeholder: // Shigar da dokokin nahawun ku a nan...
grammar.desc: Ayyana dokoki da tsarin nahawun harshenku.
grammar.no_morph_rules: Har yanzu ba a ayyana dokokin morphology ba. Fara da ƙara guda ɗaya!
grammar.sandbox_desc: Rubuta jumla don ganin yadda nahawun ku da morphology suke aiki tare.
grammar.title: Editan Nahawu

integrity.desc: Idan kun ci gaba, wannan kalmar ba za a sake yi mata alamar tushe ba kuma kalmomin da aka samo daga gare ta za su rasa haɗin 'derived from'. Wannan aikin ba za a iya soke shi ba.
integrity.title: Cire haɗin shigarwa
integrity.warning: Wannan kalmar tushen wasu kalmomi ne a cikin lexicon ɗinku. Cire haɗin zai lalata waɗannan alaƙar.

lbl.allow_duplicates_desc: Bada damar shigarwa da yawa tare da siffar kalma ɗaya.
lbl.allowed_chars: Haruffa da aka yarda da su (Regex)
lbl.allowed_chars_desc: Kalmomin da suka dace da wannan regex ne kawai za su zama ingantattu. Misali: a-zA-Z
lbl.case_sensitive_desc: Daukar 'a' da 'A' a matsayin haruffa daban-daban yayin tabbatarwa.
lbl.structure_desc: Ayyana halattaccen tsarin gaɓa ko kalma. Yi amfani da C don consonantes, V don vovels. Misali: C?VC?V

lexicon.action_cannot_undo: Wannan aikin ba za a iya soke shi ba.
lexicon.ai_requires_key: Samar da AI yana buƙatar mabuɗin API.
lexicon.delete_confirm_desc: Shin kun tabbata kuna son share kalmar
lexicon.etymology_placeholder: misali An aro daga High Valyrian...
lexicon.regex_error: Regex mara inganci a cikin takaitawa
lexicon.view_mode_pinned: Duba rikice-rikicen da aka saka pin

morph.subtitle: Shirya yadda kalmomi ke canzawa tare da affixes.
morph.title: Morphology

notebook.placeholder: Fara rubuta daftarin ayyukanku a nan...
notebook.subtitle: An kunna Optical scaling don duba script dalla-dalla.
notebook.switch_prompt: Canza zuwa yanayin Script don ganin glyphs ɗinku
notebook.title: Notebook Sandbox

phonology.ai_disabled_desc: Da fatan za a saita mabuɗin API ɗinku a cikin saituna don kunna ayyukan AI.
phonology.clear_confirm: Shin kun tabbata kuna son share dukkan fonemes?
phonology.generation_failed: Samarwar AI ya gaza. Duba mabuɗin API ko sake gwanawa.
phonology.replace_confirm: Wannan zai MAYE GURBIN phonology ɗinku na yanzu. Shin kun tabbata?
phonology.replace_warning: Duba sautunan da ke sama. Idan kun aiwatar da wannan samarwa, phonology ɗinku na yanzu za a **maye gurbinsa**.
phonology.subtitle: Tsara tsarin sautinku da siffofin gaɓoƙi.
phonology.title: Phonology
phonology.unclassified_consonants: Consonantes da ba a rarraba su ba (daga AI)
phonology.unclassified_vowels: Vovels da ba a rarraba su ba (daga AI)
phonology.no_phoneme_found: Ba a sami foneme ba don wannan cell.

script.spacing_proportional_desc: Sarari daidai da girman harafi (faɗi mai canzawa)
script.title: Neural-Glyph Studio v1.3

settings.api_key_ph: Shigar da Gemini API Key ɗinku
settings.api_key_required: Ana buƙatar mabuɗin API don ayyukan AI.
settings.help_free_desc: Ee, amfani da Gemini API kyauta ne don ƙaramin amfani. Duba takardun Google don cikakkun bayanai da matakan farashi.
settings.help_step_1: 1. Je zuwa Google AI Studio don ƙirƙirar mabuɗin API ɗinku. (Kuna buƙatar asusun Google)
settings.help_step_2: 2. Danna kan 'Get API Key in a new project' ko 'Create API Key in an existing project'.
settings.help_step_3: 3. Kwafi mabuɗin API da aka samar.
settings.help_step_4: 4. Saka mabuɗin API a cikin filin shigarwa na sama.
settings.help_step_5: 5. Danna 'Kammala saituna' don ajiye mabuɗin ku.
settings.help_subtitle: Bi waɗannan matakan don samarwa da tsara mabuɗin Gemini API ɗinku.
settings.title: Saituna

sort.custom_order_desc: Shigar da haruffa a cikin tsarin haruffa da kuke so (misali a,b,c,aa,ab,...) don jeri mai zurfi.

source.desc: Duba da gyara danyen bayanan JSON na aikin ku.
source.title: Tushen Aiki
source.warning: Gargadi: Gyara kai tsaye na iya haifar da lalacewar bayanai.

val.custom_sort_placeholder: a b c d e f g...
val.desc: Tsara dokokin tabbatarwa da jeri don lexicon ɗinku.
val.must_end: Kalmar ba ta ƙare da tsarin da ake buƙata ba.
val.must_start: Kalmar ba ta fara da tsarin da ake buƙata ba.
val.no_bans: Babu hadin da aka haramta da aka tsara.

whats_new.f1_desc: Dukkannin harsuna 46 yanzu an fassara su daidai kuma an sanya su na duniya baki ɗaya.
whats_new.title: Menene Sabo a v1.3.0

wizard.author: Marubuci
wizard.create_desc: Fara sabon aikin conlang baki ɗaya.
wizard.edit_desc: Daidaita mahimman bayanai na aikin ku.
wizard.name: Sunan Aiki
wizard.optional: Zaɓi, ana iya daidaitawa daga baya.
wizard.overwrite_confirm: Shin kun tabbata kuna son ƙirƙirar sabon aiki? Wannan zai share yanayin yanzu.
